## Current opportunities for students of Computer Science

Current opportunities and vacancies to help you build your future are highlighted below. If you've been redirected to this page from somewhere else, it's because the opportunity you saw is no longer available. The opportunities below are taken from the Wednesday Waggle, shown in figure \@ref(fig:waggle-fig2), which gets updated weekly during [term-time](https://www.manchester.ac.uk/about/key-dates/).

* Opportunities to build your portfolio with codecrafters, see chapter \@ref(crafting)
* Opportunities with the Bright Network, see chapter \@ref(bright)
* Opportunities to help your CV stand out with some extra certifications, see chapter \@ref(mancrosoft)

This is not a comprehensive listing, just some highlights. To find more opportunities like this, see chapter \@ref(finding): _Finding Your Future_ and particularly section \@ref(looking).
